tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Missed the cut in both of his PGA TOUR China Series starts—at the Mission Hills Haikou Open and the Buick Open…In his next start, at the Lanhai Open, shot rounds of 72-73-77-76 to finish T57 outside Shanghai. 

2013: Easily made the cut at the Nanshan China Masters in mid-October but then stumbled to a 77-80 finish on the weekend to T67 at Nanshan International GC…Was T45 at the Foshan Open on the European Challenge Tour, middle rounds of 71-71 the highlight...Missed the cut at the Volvo China Open (79-74)

2011: Was 5-over at the Nanshan China Masters, good for a T56. 
2009: Missed the cut in the inaugural OneAsia Tour event, the Volvo China Open (8-over). 
2008: Missed the cut at the China Open (74-76). 
2007: At the season-opening China Tour event, the Sofitel Championship, finished sixth. His even-par 288 left him nine strokes behind Wu Kangchun. 
2006: After opening 69-70, came through with consecutive 73s on the weekend at the China Tour's Shanghai event to finish fifth, three shots out of the Zhang Lianwei-Huang Ming Jie playoff at Grand Shanghai International Golf Resort.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Had a hole-in-one at Boao CC in March 2005. Had a hole-in-one at Boao CC in March 2005.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T30th in 2015 at the The Eternal Courtyard Open.
